analysis.Summary: Vue page component that, on mount, fetches a list of tasks from the store and renders them as CardTaskItem blocks.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a user interface for displaying all governance-related tasks in a list format within the application.

Components.name: Tasks.vue
Components.role: Page-level component coordinating data fetch and rendering of task items.

Components.name: CardTaskItem
Components.role: Presentational component responsible for displaying a single task’s details.

Functions.name: onMounted callback
Functions.description: Lifecycle hook that triggers fetching of all tasks when the component is mounted.

Functions.name: tasksActions.getAllTasks
Functions.description: Asynchronous action that retrieves the full list of tasks from the backend or store.

analysis.Usage: Typically registered as a route component in the governance module’s router. Other parts of the app import it to display the tasks page under a specific URL path.
Notes: No local <style> section—styling is inherited or defined globally.
Relies on a centralized store (tasksState) for reactive data binding.
Error handling for the async fetch is not implemented here and should be managed at a higher level or within the action.
